Package survey

Class SurveyOption

java.lang.Object
survey.SurveyOption
public class SurveyOption extends Object
Class representing an option in a survey.

    • containsVoter

      public boolean containsVoter(Employee user)
      Checks if a specific user has voted for the survey option.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to check for.
      Returns:
      True if the user has voted for the option, false otherwise.
